title: Chat
description: The Chat feature provides a conversational interface for users to interact with an AI assistant, enabling code-related assistance, guidance, and natural language dialogue.
acceptance_criteria: The backend application exposes APIs to handle user messages, including text, code snippets, and commands.
The backend application utilizes an LLM to process user messages and generate responses.
The backend application supports streaming of LLM responses, allowing for a more natural and interactive chat experience.
The backend application handles token count for LLM interactions, providing accurate information to users.
The backend application supports different LLM models, enabling users to choose the most appropriate model for their needs.
